content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a response from the "google" command with links to information about Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye). As for my latest actions, I executed the "browse_website" command with the argument of "https://www.debian.org/releases/bullseye/" and the question "What are the new features in Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)?" from the provided text.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text states that Debian 11.0, also known as bullseye, was released on August 14th, 2021 and included many major changes, which are described in the press release and Release Notes. However, the text does not provide specific details about the new features. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.debian.org/)', 'Skip Quicknav (https://www.debian.org/releases/bullseye/#content)', 'Blog (https://bits.debian.org/)', 'Micronews (https://micronews.debian.org)', 'Planet (https://planet.debian.org/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "new features in Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)"}}}'}]
"""
